name: Lé Bonque
description:
you bonk

A fast-paced, skill-based, bonk-oriented single-player platforming game, where you use your magical hammer to hit targets and reveal the level as you play.

Features include:

 - Bonking with the Bonker

 - Swinging on bars Monké style

 - Super cool wall runs Spacey visuals

Works only with controllers :)

Work in progress, plans for the future: Procedural endless runner, level  editor, mobile game

Made with 2 people in 4 days with Unity
